title: Fringe Encounter:  GrimGriz & PVK
description:
Pastor Paul Vanderklay runs a YouTube channel as well as a ministry in Sacramento California. Enjoy my second conversation with him.

DISCLAIMER:  I've had to remain unmedicated for almost a week, totally not my A game :)

Here's a Discord for people who don't hate me: https://discord.gg/2bZtrzTYza
Here's a Patreon for people who want to encourage me: https://www.patreon.com/grimgriz

Here's where you can get the lobstamonkee on stuff:
T-shirt:  https://etsy.me/35b670h
Cup:  https://etsy.me/3pMzw87

https://grimgriz.substack.com/
here too:
https://grimgriz.medium.com/
